title: Special commodity levy  on fruits, dairy products introduced
body_lines: The Trade and Investment Policy Department of the Finance Ministry has imposed a Special Commodity Levy on several imported items such as fruits and dairy products.
A notice on this was issued by the Trade and Investment Policy Department Director General K.A. Vimalenthirarajah, under the instructions of the Finance Minister.
This Special Commodity Levy was imposed on the following goods for a duration of six months beginning from March 10. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
